name: wasm96-assemblyscript-guest
description: AssemblyScript guest module for wasm96 (manual ABI imports) - Generated Flappy example

scripts.build: asc main.as.ts --target release --optimize --noAssert --exportRuntime --runtime stub --use abort= -o flappy.wasm
scripts.build:debug: asc main.as.ts --target debug --exportRuntime --runtime stub --use abort= -o flappy.debug.wasm
